1103270604231327745.text: Cash is money outside the bank. If you deposit it, the bank issues you a promise saying you can get it back. You redeem this promise and exit their systems at the ATM. Thus, the banks' attempts to shut down the ATM infrastructure is an attempt to prevent you ever exiting

1059114400760713218.text: A key principle of a functioning democracy is privacy for citizens and transparency of those in power. Have you noticed we have the opposite? Most algorithms are in service of customers who want "predictions" that transfer of power from the poor to the powerful.
